short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click to bulk hide all replies & comments of your tweet. Import user list to hide replies that are not in the list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide tweet replies in batches, import a user list, and hide all replies from non-in-list.
The must have X replies hide tool.

HOW TO USE
1. Enter your own tweet link, select hide or unhide action, select all or import usernames.
2. Click the start button.

NOTICE
1. please enter your own tweet link, otherwise the tool will throw an error.
2. The tool use X website to get all replies, it can only hide all replies those could shown in X.com website.
